resources:
// Application Open navigation drawer Close navigation drawer HHS Moodle Used permission \"Access storage\" permission:
• Lists: creating and storing.
• Backup: backup and restore databases.
• Downloads: save downloads on the sd-card.
• Screenshots: save screenshots of a website on the sd-card.

Grant permission later:
If you don\'t permit this now, you can do it later. Please open then \"Settings -> Grant permission\". Used permission Manage \"Do not disturb\":
This is used to set your phone in silent mode during lessons.

Grant permission later:
If you don\'t permit this now, you can do it later. Please open then \"Settings -> Do not disturb\". Share screenshot using: Share link using: Choose file with: splashScreen Attachment My Moodle Please wait … Closing app. // Moodle Dashboard Profile Calendar Ratings Notifications Settings School homepage Web search Moodle Check Clock // About About HHS Moodle Developer Used open source libraries Changelog Open Github site and see what\'s new … (needs internet connection) License The app is licensed under GPL and completely open source and free (as in freedom). Gaukler Faun Open my profile on Github (needs internet connection). Intro Show the intro screen one more time. Used to build the intro screen. Used to encrypt pin (for app protection). Used to create the \"About screen\". The source of nearly all icons. A powerful library for Android to display media files. // IntroScreen HHS Moodle Thanks for choosing HHS Moodle. Please read the following introduction carefully. You can reach all important functions by swiping from the left to the middle of your screen. Navigation You can reach all important functions by swiping from the left to the middle of your screen. Help Over the menu you can reach a help dialog on every screen. Settings Configure the app to your fittings. Security All databases and your login data are decrypted. Create a pin to protect the app against unwanted usage. Login Enter your Moodle login data on the next screen. You will be logged in automatically in future. You can edit your login data in the settings. // Login Username Password Please enter username and password. If this does not work: edit your login data in the settings. This dialog will disappear, when you are successfully logged in. Automatic login // Tab - Titles Bookmarks Notes Browser title date extension icon notification attachment // Menu Items Share website Share screenshot Share link as text Open link in external browser Copy link to clipboard Save screenshot Settings Add bookmark Help Tools Exit app Configure Add entry Sort entries Sort by title Sort by icon Sort by date Sort by Attachment Sort by notification Sort by extension Search Search in titles Search in content Search in creation dates Search in URLs Search in attachments Search in courses Search in subjects Search for file extension Today Yesterday Day before yesterday This month Own search // Context Menu Link successfully copied Saving image as: // Settings App settings Permissions | About Security Login data (Moodle) Please enter your Moodle username and password to get automatically logged in. Main screen Which tab should be displayed as default on the main screen? About Learn more about the app (changelog, license, used libraries, …). Pin (App access) Set a pin to protect app against unwanted access. Only use numbers. Let empty, if you do not want to protect the app (own risk). Problems? Send me a mail. Font size Change font size for websites. Backup Backup and restore your databases (notes, bookmarks, …). A new backup overwrites the old one. Automatic backup Always backup all databases (Todo, bookmarks, …), when leaving the app. Shortcuts Create shortcuts on your desktop for fast access to main functions of the app (Bookmarks, todo lists, …). Silent mode Set your phone in silent mode during lessons. If you use Android Nougat or newer you need to permit \"Do not disturb\" below. Airplane mode Enable airplane mode during lessons. Works only on rooted devices (Thanks Google!). Restore // Snackbar OK Cancel Never show Downloading file: Do you want to download: Download completed. Open folder manager? Permissions granted? Uuups. Wrong password. Shortcut successfully created. Backup failed. Restore failed. Failed to create screenshot. No supported file extension Please install an app to perform action. Title already exists. There\'s no entry in the list. Can not save entry. Content added. Can\'t open Directory. No files in directory. Please choose text file. Open settings This overwrites the actual backup, which gets lost. This overwrites the actual database. Current data will be lost. // Bookmarks Delete entry Adding entry. Successfully set as favorite. You can only choose one favorite. Edit title Create note Create calendar event Create shortcut // Notes Entry will be removed. OK? Edit note Share note using: Attachment Title Content + Content // Password Pin (only numbers) Pin forgotten? Do you want to delete all user data (also login data, saved bookmarks, notes, …) to reset your app pin? The application will close. //File chooser Files Share Rename Delete New filename Edit filename Choose attachment // Grade 100 Max. credits Please enter maximal credits. Grades calculation Percent Credits Grade // Number Random generator Error reading file. Random number Enter number … First enter a number … … then press \"ok\". Edit entry Please enter data to the list. Create random list // ToDo Todo From course list From subject list Custom title New entry … Create todo list Entry deleted Restore? Share entry Paste actual date Paste actual time Please enter an item first. // CourseList Course lists From text file + course members // Schedule Weekend Schedule --- --- Monday Tuesday Wednesday Thursday Friday Search by teachers Search by rooms From subject list Show todo list Show notes // Subjects Subjects Name Teacher Room Edit subject Copy entry Red Pink Purple Blue Teal Green Lime Yellow Orange Brown Grey // Count Counter Create counter
